abstract: Claudio Andrés Bravo Muñoz (born 13 April 1983) is a Chilean professional footballer who plays for Real Sociedad in La Liga, as a goalkeeper.He began his career in 2002 with Colo-Colo, before moving to Sociedad in 2006. He has appeared in more than 200 official games for the club.Bravo has been a full international since 2004, and has represented Chile at the 2010 World Cup and three Copa América tournaments.
